attributes.action: Hold a referendum on whether the Iraq war should be adjudged by an international court to be legal or otherwise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Tony Blair will be remembered (most probably) for taking the U.K into an illegal war with Iraq.
I believe the people of the U.K should decide if the matter of the legality of the war should be tested by an independant international court.
I believe the U.N has the capacity to instruct such a court, should the British people choose.
